formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: On Increment 5 test 16 there is a LENGTH ERROR in AnchorVars[12] with the following error message:

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The f mask contains only those scopes indicated by Function nodes. However, in the calculation of the scopes, we also include the root node as a scope. This means that there is an off by one error here. To fix this, we can simply use the rf mask, which includes the root node.
